title: punished for others leaving queue?
body: I am confused, i never dodge games yet when other people leave I am getting punished with lengthier wait times to be able to play again? First it was 5 minutes and then 10 minutes now 20 minutes... Why am I being punished for someone else leaving the queue? Once again I am not dodging at all? so wahts up with that?

replies.body:
It sounds like your client may not be displaying the notification for a queue pop, which could lengthen the time you have to wait if it happens frequently. Most of the time, this is caused by the client not establishing a solid connection to the PvP.net service. As a first step, I recommend working through the steps in our [connection guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
